verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and <S%H8248>give<s%> them <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>"

Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2262>Habazziniah,<s%> and his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%>

and I <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> into the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3012>Igdaliah,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H681>near<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H8269>officials,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H8104>doorkeeper.<s%> <S%H5592><s%>

Then I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>men<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%> <S%H1375>pitchers<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and <S%H3563>cups;<s%> and I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8354>"Drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine!<s%>"

But they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We will not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> for <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> our father, <S%H1>commanded<s%> us, <S%H6680>saying,<s%> 'You shall not <S%H559>drink<s%> <S%H8354>wine,<s%> you or your <S%H3196>sons,<s%> <S%H1121>forever.<s%> <S%H5704><s%>

'And you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house,<s%> and you shall not <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and you shall not <S%H5193>plant<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> or <S%H1961>own<s%> one; but in <S%H168>tents<s%> you shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3117>days,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you <S%H1481>sojourn.<s%>'

"And we have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> our father, in <S%H1>all<s%> that he <S%H3605>commanded<s%> us, not to <S%H6680>drink<s%> <S%H8354>wine<s%> <S%H3196>all<s%> our <S%H3605>days,<s%> we, our <S%H3117>wives,<s%> our <S%H802>sons,<s%> or our <S%H1121>daughters,<s%>
<S%H1115>nor<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> ourselves <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in; and we do not <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> or <S%H7704>field<s%> or <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

"We have only <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H168>tents,<s%> and have <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> our father <S%H1>commanded<s%> us.

"But it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> that we <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>'Come<s%> and let us <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> and <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Arameans.<s%>' So we have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1980>'Go<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> "Will you not <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> by <S%H8085>listening<s%> to My <S%H1697>words<s%>? <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> are <S%H6965>observed.<s%> So they do not <S%H8354>drink<s%> [wine] to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> for they have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> their father's <S%H4687>command.<s%> But I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you <S%H7925>again<s%> and <S%H1696>again;<s%> yet you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to Me.

"Also I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> <S%H7971>sending<s%> [them] <S%H7925>again<s%> and <S%H7971>again,<s%> <S%H559>saying:<s%> <S%H7725>'Turn<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H4611>deeds,<s%> and do not <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>worship<s%> them, then you shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and to your forefathers; but you have not <S%H1>inclined<s%> your <S%H5186>ear<s%> or <S%H241>listened<s%> to Me.

<S%H3588>'Indeed,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> have <S%H6965>observed<s%> the <S%H4687>command<s%> of their father <S%H1>which<s%> he <S%H834>commanded<s%> them, but <S%H6680>this<s%> <S%H2088>people<s%> has not <S%H5971>listened<s%> to Me.' "'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am <S%H935>bringing<s%> on <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9567>disaster<s%> that I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them; <S%H3282>because<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them but they did not <S%H8085>listen,<s%> and I have <S%H7121>called<s%> them but they did not <S%H6030>answer.<s%>'"

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H4687>command<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> your father, <S%H1>kept<s%> <S%H8104>all<s%> his <S%H3605>commands,<s%> and <S%H4687>done<s%> according to <S%H6213>all<s%> that he <S%H3605>commanded<s%> you;

<S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3082>"Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> shall not <S%H3772>lack<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>"' "
